    • Method Detail

      • getPermissionLevelByName

        PermissionLevel getPermissionLevelByName(String name)

      • getPermissionLevelType

        String getPermissionLevelType(PermissionLevel level)

      • createPermissionLevel

        PermissionLevel createPermissionLevel(String name,
                                    String typeUuid,
                                    PermissionsMask mask)

      • getDefaultOwnerPermissionLevel

        PermissionLevel getDefaultOwnerPermissionLevel()
        Returns:
        the PermissionLevel representing the "Owner" level. If no level exists in MFR_PERMISSION_LEVEL_T, returns a default owner permission level.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if no "Owner" type exists

      • getDefaultAuthorPermissionLevel

        PermissionLevel getDefaultAuthorPermissionLevel()
        Returns:
        the PermissionLevel representing the "Author" level. If no level exists in MFR_PERMISSION_LEVEL_T, returns a default Author permission level.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if no "Author" type exists

      • getDefaultNoneditingAuthorPermissionLevel

        PermissionLevel getDefaultNoneditingAuthorPermissionLevel()
        Returns:
        the PermissionLevel representing the "NoneditingAuthor" level. If no level exists in MFR_PERMISSION_LEVEL_T, returns a default Nonediting Author permission level.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if no "NoneditingAuthor" type exists

      • getDefaultReviewerPermissionLevel

        PermissionLevel getDefaultReviewerPermissionLevel()
        Returns:
        the PermissionLevel representing the "Reviewer" level. If no level exists in MFR_PERMISSION_LEVEL_T, returns a default owner permission level.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if no "Reviewer" type exists

      • getDefaultContributorPermissionLevel

        PermissionLevel getDefaultContributorPermissionLevel()
        Returns:
        the PermissionLevel representing the "Contributor" level. If no level exists in MFR_PERMISSION_LEVEL_T, returns a default Contributor permission level.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if no "Contributor" type exists

      • getDefaultNonePermissionLevel

        PermissionLevel getDefaultNonePermissionLevel()
        Returns:
        the PermissionLevel representing the "None" level. If no level exists in MFR_PERMISSION_LEVEL_T, returns a default None permission level.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if no "None" type exists

      • getDefaultPermissionLevels

        List<PermissionLevel> getDefaultPermissionLevels()
        Returns:
        a list of the default (non-custom) permission levels available

      • savePermissionLevel

        void savePermissionLevel(PermissionLevel level)

      • getOrderedPermissionLevelNames

        List getOrderedPermissionLevelNames()
        Returns:
        a non-null list of the names for the non-custom permissions
